title: Toyota records highest-ever monthly sales in June at 27,474 units
description: Toyota Kirloskar Motor achieved its best-ever monthly sales in June 2024, with 27,474 units, marking a 40% increase from June 2023. Domestic sales were 25,752 units, while exports reached 1,722 units. The sales surge was driven by strong demand for SUVs and MPVs and strategic expansion into rural markets.
